EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_ThePlatform_Q114.Attended
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You For Joining Us for The Platform for Building Great Software Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
We'd like to thank you for joining us yesterday for our webinar event: The Platform for Building Great Software
We invite you to listen to the replay <http://gopivotal.com/resources/#http://bitcast-a.v1.o1.sjc1.bitgravity.com/greenplum/pivotalvideo/The_Platform_For_Building_Great_Software.m4v> and review the slides <http://www.slideshare.net/platformcf/pivotal-cf-the-platform-for-building-great-software>. By attending this event your company is eligible for a complimentary technical briefing, giving you the opportunity to dig deeper on the platform and engage with our expert engineering team. If you haven't already, please register here <http://www.gopivotal.com/pivotal-one-technical-briefing>.
Our next installment in this series will be announced next week. We look forward to seeing you next time!
Have questions? Contact us <mailto:pivotal-operations@gopivotal.com>.
Regards, The Pivotal Team
Check out Pivotal P.O.V. Visit Our Blog >> <http://blog.gopivotal.com/>
Delivering Pivotal One Read More >> <http://www.gopivotal.com/paas>
Follow Us: Twitter <http://www.twitter.com/gopivotal> | LinkedIn <http://www.linkedin.com/company/gopivotal> | Facebook <http://www.facebook.com/gopivotal> | Google+ <https://plus.google.com/105320112436428794490>
